mapper.update: update product set prod_amount = case when prod_amount >= 0 then prod_amount-1 else prod_amount end, remain_amount = case when prod_amount < 0 then remain_amount+1 else remain_amount end, prod_${mem_grade}=prod_${mem_grade}+1 where prod_num=#{fix1} or prod_num=#{fix2} or prod_num=#{fix3}
mapper.select: select o.order_num, o.order_date, p.prod_name, o.order_count, p.prod_price from petmily.order o, product p where p.prod_num = o.prod_num and user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from(select o.order_num, o.order_date, p.prod_name, o.order_count, p.prod_price from petmily.order o, product p where p.prod_num = o.prod_num and user_id = #{user_id}) mem

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from(select o.order_num, o.order_date, p.prod_name, o.order_count, p.prod_price from petmily.order o, product p where p.prod_num = o.prod_num and user_id = #{user_id}) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
mapper.insert: insert into petmily.order (order_num, user_id, order_address, prod_num, order_status, order_count, order_date) values(#{order.order_num},#{user.user_id},#{user.user_totaddress}, #{prod_num} ,#{order.order_status}, #{order.order_count}, now())
